dcterms:description: A high-quality Chinese dataset constructed from user reviews on the real-world platform of Meituan, specifically designed for negation triplet extraction tasks.
dcterms:title: NegComment

dcterms:creator: N. Konstantinova
S. C. M. De Sousa
N. P. Cruz Díaz
M. J. Mana López
M. Taboada
R. Mitkov
dcterms:description: A review corpus annotated for negation, speculation, and their scope, used for evaluating negation understanding tasks.
dcterms:title: SFU Review dataset
